english.segment1: vs1. down to the wire of words that arent said. and im building the pieces together in my head. to make a place i sleep soundly. a place i think clearly. oh, where do we go. where do we go from here
english.segment2: theres a sign in the yard and a lump in my throat. a new plot of land and fresh lumber is in tow. two kids in their car seats and hope for our history. and letting it go. letting it go from here
english.segment3: ch. i need a builder, a better design. a house with more windows and more ways inside
english.segment4: vs2. were leaving behind all that our parents wrote. were replacing the past and all our fathers hopes. with a new street address and a new bag of tools. to make room as we grow. room as we grow from here
english.segment5: ch. we need a builder, a better design. a house with more windows and more ways inside
